NK032(khi)008:1: // 'dzeng d+harma bo d+hi'i lo rgyus bzhugs so //
NK032(khi)008:3: 'dzeng d+harma bo d+hi'i lo rgyus ni /
NK032(khi)008:4: gdung rus gung po'i zim shi yin /
NK032(khi)008:7: yum mtshar mo mtsho dkar bya ba yin /
NK032(khi)008:8: yab de phur pa'i sgo nas grub pa thob nas /
NK032(khi)008:9: rdo rje gzhon nu'i zhal gzigs /
NK032(khi)008:10: brgyad cu rtsa bzhi lnga yang snang /
NK032(khi)008:12: rdo rje'i gzhon nu'i sku dang /
NK032(khi)008:14: khong 'dzeng rang 'brug gi lo ston zla ra ba'i
NK032(khi)008:15: tshes bdun la klung gi khron pa ru sku 'khrungs
NK032(khi)008:16: nas / mtshar dgu klongs su zhang po'i gan du bzhugs so //
NK032(khi)008:17: lo dgu lon tsa na yab kyis 'dzeng btsad bcang spyan drangs nas /
NK032(khi)008:18: phyag na rdo rje'i rgyal po'i skor zhus /
NK032(khi)008:19: yab la phur pa ur nan dang /
NK032(khi)008:20: rnam gsum skor zhus nas thugs dam mdzad /
NK032(khi)008:22: la dol gyi gser kha ru dam pa dang mjal /
NK032(khi)008:23: don brgyud kyi gdams ngag gnang /
NK032(khi)008:25: gtsang gnubs yul rong du rten 'brel 'ga' zung dang sngags kyi gnad mang du gnang /
NK032(khi)008:26: de nas rgyang rong mtshal ma bya ba ru yi
NK032(khi)008:27: ge drug ma'i gdams ngag gnang nas sgrub pa mdzad
NK032(khi)008:28: pas byin rlabs thun mong ma yin pa byung gsungs
NK032(khi)008:29: / de nas dbus su 'gro snyam pa la /
NK032(khi)008:30: dam pas mkhyen nas khyed 'agro'am gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:32: dam pa'i gsang spyod kyis shig pa'i brda' ru /
NK032(khi)008:34: dbu la thug thug pa lan gsum mdzad nas /
NK032(khi)008:35: ci yang ma yin gnas gyur pa //
NK032(khi)008:36: gnas gyur pa la gnyis 'dzin med //
NK032(khi)008:37: gsung nas byin rlabs 'pho ba yang mdzad /
NK032(khi)008:38: chu bo chen po 'di'i shar phyogs na tsan dan gyi nags gcig yod /
NK032(khi)008:39: de na khyod kyi bla ma yod gsungs nas lung bstan /
NK032(khi)008:40: dbus su byon nas a khu a jo dpal 'bar la zhing phul nas /
NK032(khi)008:41: khrag thun dang pe dkar gsang sgrub zhus gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:42: gnubs shang po che la kri ya'i sgrub thabs dang /
NK032(khi)008:44: khong gis gtsang du ba ri la 'bul ba skyel du btang /
NK032(khi)008:45: chos snga ma gsum la'ang lung zhus /
NK032(khi)008:46: 'jam dpal dang khyung gi sgrub thabs zhus /
NK032(khi)008:47: dge bshes sba la snga 'gyur lnga zhus /
NK032(khi)008:48: de nas ngam shod nas yar la ldom bu la byon pas /
NK032(khi)008:49: phug po cher rba sgom dang mjal /
NK032(khi)008:50: de'i lo la mu ge che bas sprang po la tshogs bsog gis 'dug pa la /
NK032(khi)008:51: 'dzeng gis shing bsdus chu blang byas pas mnyes nas /
NK032(khi)008:52: sang gnang dgun shog gsungs nas byon pas /
NK032(khi)008:53: bsgom tshul gyi cho ga lan gsum mdzad /
NK032(khi)008:54: rdo rje zam pa lhag ma ma lus par gnang ngo //
NK032(khi)008:55: jo bo rje la pa ra mi ta'i lam brkyang khug dang /
NK032(khi)008:56: rgyal po ra ma pha la'i gdams pa dang /
NK032(khi)008:57: dus 'khor gyi sbyor drug zhus gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:58: de nas dbu rur byon khams pa lung pa la thun brgyad ma zhus /
NK032(khi)008:59: sne'u zur pa'i slob ma zhig la dmigs pa skor gsum dang /
NK032(khi)008:60: tshogs bdag gi sgrub thabs dang /
NK032(khi)008:61: nad sel gyi gdams pa zhus /
NK032(khi)008:62: yang phug po cher byon pas slob dpon rba sgom gyis bdud rtsi'i bcud len gnang /
NK032(khi)008:63: nga sring mo mang bas 'di bya dbang ma byung /
NK032(khi)008:65: rdo rje zam pa'i sgrub sde tsho gnang /
NK032(khi)008:66: bri ba ni ma grub gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:67: de nas yang gtsang du byon /
NK032(khi)008:68: zhang 'bro smyon la d+aa ki yi ge bzhi pa zhus /
NK032(khi)008:69: jo btsun sog po bya ba la rdo rje zam pa bshad /
NK032(khi)008:70: nyang stod du so bsnyun gdangs pa lta ba'i rgyab sha dang /
NK032(khi)008:72: de nas bla ma rdza phor ba dang mjal /
NK032(khi)008:73: bdud rtsi tshig gsum pa'i gdams ngag zhus pas /
NK032(khi)008:74: bla ma'i zhal nas bud+d+ha la mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba yin te /
NK032(khi)008:76: sems can la rig pa bya ba yod de 'dzin cha yin /
NK032(khi)008:77: 'dzin cha de nang dag na nang mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur la /
NK032(khi)008:78: nub dag na nub mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa yin gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:79: de la nges shes che bar skyes gsungs so //
NK032(khi)008:80: ri khrod rlung chung pa la /
NK032(khi)008:83: la stod du byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' dang mjal /
NK032(khi)008:84: gdams pa kha yar dang ab ci'i sgrub thabs zhus /
NK032(khi)008:85: de'i dus su a tsa ra dam pa'i spyod pa /
NK032(khi)008:86: brtsol pa kho'i lag pa nas khrid nas gtsang por mchongs pas chu phar khar chod /
NK032(khi)008:88: gtsang du rnal 'byor pa stag sham can nas dbu sdebs sam thud ka 'bar ram /
NK032(khi)008:90: zhang 'bro smyon nam mang po dang 'grogs te /
NK032(khi)008:91: de tsho rtogs ldan grub thob tu 'dug gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:92: ngas so mang can la phyag rgya chen po btab pas /
NK032(khi)008:93: mi las 'das te 'khrul snang dag nas ye shes
NK032(khi)008:94: kyi snang ba 'ba' zhig tu 'char nas 'dug gsungs
NK032(khi)008:95: / rdul mi rgyal le la yi ge bzhi pa
NK032(khi)008:96: dang rdzogs chen gyi gdams ngag btab pas zhig mo
NK032(khi)008:97: mi las 'das pa zhig byung gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:98: gtsang du lo bdun bzhugs nas mar byon /
NK032(khi)008:99: yang phug po che ru yong bas /
NK032(khi)008:100: slob dpon rba sgom gyi zhal nas gdams ngag ngo mtshar can gcig sbyin no gsungs nas /
NK032(khi)008:102: nam mkha' 'di khong du chud par gyis shig /
NK032(khi)008:103: de rten med du rtogs na sgom med don gyi gzer chen thebs pa yin gsungs pas /
NK032(khi)008:104: nges shes thun mong ma yin pa skyes gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:105: lar slob dpon rba sgom pa de sangs rgyas rang yin 'dug sems pa zhig byung /
NK032(khi)008:106: de nas dwags po ru bzhugs /
NK032(khi)008:107: sde pa de phyag ris chen por mdzad /
NK032(khi)008:108: bla ma zhal gdams byon pa la bsnyen bkur nas /
NK032(khi)008:110: lhun grub sde skor bdun dang /
NK032(khi)008:111: thugs sgrub kyi gdams pa zhus gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:112: dge bshes shud pu lo ts+aa ba la 'grel chung rgya cher 'grel pa gsan gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:113: dge bshes grol sgom la n+aa ro'i thabs lam zhus gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:114: rdo rje zam pa phar la bshad pas nges shes skyes gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:115: sgam po pa chen po dang mjal nas yi ge drug pa dang /
NK032(khi)008:116: skyes sbyor dris lan gsungs pas /
NK032(khi)008:117: sgam po pa la sangs rgyas su mthong /
NK032(khi)008:118: bla ma de tsho bsten nas dka' thub mdzad pa'i lo rgyus ni /
NK032(khi)008:119: rdo rje zam pa zhus nas phug po cher bdud
NK032(khi)008:120: rtsi'i dka' thub mdzad pas rim gyis mi 'jigs pa
NK032(khi)008:121: byung / gnubs shang po che'i drung du bla ma'i
NK032(khi)008:122: g.yog gis dka' thub byas pas gar phyin du bla
NK032(khi)008:124: dam pa rgya gar gyi drung du bsam mno'i dka'
NK032(khi)008:125: thub byas pas chos gang la yang byan tshud pas
NK032(khi)008:126: dngos grub byung / kyi khung du phur pa'i bzlas pa la dka' thub byas pas /
NK032(khi)008:127: 'jig rten gyi lha 'dres ci smras nyan pa'i dngos grub byung /
NK032(khi)008:128: bka' gdams kyi sa ru zhi dul gyi dka' thub byas pas /
NK032(khi)008:129: gar phyin du mis byams pa'i dngos grub byung /
NK032(khi)008:130: yi ge bzhi la mi sdod pa gsum gyi dka' thub byas pas /
NK032(khi)008:132: gcer bu lo lnga mdzad gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:133: de la nges shes skyes nas phag mo mngon 'byung la sgrub pa mdzad pas /
NK032(khi)008:134: mgur mo'i nub phyogs su rje btsun ma zhal gzigs brda' mang po gnang gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:135: gnubs yul rong du rmi lam sbyangs pas 'byongs te /
NK032(khi)008:136: snang ba thams cad du rmi lam du ngo shes pa byung /
NK032(khi)008:137: lan gcig jo mo dang gnyis shing 'thu ru phyin
NK032(khi)008:138: pas shing khur che ba gcig rnyed nas khur phyin
NK032(khi)008:139: pas / mtha' chen po gcig tu sleb tsa na /
NK032(khi)008:140: rmi lam du 'dug snyam nas mchongs pas /
NK032(khi)008:141: ma gi ru bya babs pa bzhin byung gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:142: jo mo pra mo na re /
NK032(khi)008:143: bla ma khyed la mi yam me ba gcig las mi 'dug /
NK032(khi)008:144: dam pa rgya gar rang yang dran dran du 'dug gsungs skad /
NK032(khi)008:145: de nas ngam shod nas mar byon pas mon mkhar gyi 'o dkar brag la sgrub pa mdzad pas /
NK032(khi)008:146: bde mchog yab yum zhal gzigs /
NK032(khi)008:147: lan gcig 'gro snying 'dod nas phyin pas /
NK032(khi)008:148: mon mkhar grong mo che'i mdun du chu bo gcig la /
NK032(khi)008:149: da yong chu rang la yang cang 'bying ngam snyam
NK032(khi)008:150: nas mchongs pas 'khyag rum chag nas bying ba snyam
NK032(khi)008:151: tsa na / khong rnams de rang la yang ngo
NK032(khi)008:152: mtshar ches nas a rab sgang la chu nang du
NK032(khi)008:153: de tsam tshugs pa lcags tshan mo chu nang du
NK032(khi)008:154: bcug pa bzhin swa ring gi sgra byung zer /
NK032(khi)008:155: nga rang gis mthong sar yang chu la rlangs pa nam mkha' mi mthong ba byung /
NK032(khi)008:157: de nas gzho'i gti sgror phyin /
NK032(khi)008:158: shel phug tu khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i zhal mthong /
NK032(khi)008:159: mi ma yin gcig gis bsnyen bkur che bar byas gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:160: btsun gzugs gcig nam mkha' la 'phur nas phar 'gro
NK032(khi)008:161: tshur 'gro byed pa mthong la btsal bas ma rnyed
NK032(khi)008:162: / mi yin min ma shes gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:163: de nas dwags po ru bzhugs nas ab ci bsgrubs pas nyi ma gro khar zhal gzigs /
NK032(khi)008:164: dam bsre snyam tsa na jo mo phyag le byon pas bud med can zer nas /
NK032(khi)008:165: nam mkha' 'od chen po gcig tu byas nas song gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:166: de nas lta zur du sgrub pa lo gsum mdzad /
NK032(khi)008:167: bcud len gyi sgrub thabs gcig kyang byas pas /
NK032(khi)008:169: he ru ka yab yum zhal mthong /
NK032(khi)008:170: chos mang po'i rnam dag rgyud la shar gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:171: de nas jo mo phyag le dang bral /
NK032(khi)008:172: chos skyid dang 'grogs nas 'dzing du byon /
NK032(khi)008:173: de yan chad du gdams pa 'di mang du ma 'phel /
NK032(khi)008:174: byin pa yang 'ga' zung las med /
NK032(khi)008:176: grong chog mdzad cing gsang spyod mdzad /
NK032(khi)008:177: de nas thag ring nas zhu ba yang mang du byung /
NK032(khi)008:180: sbal bu gtong ma spyan drangs nas gdams pa gsungs pas /
NK032(khi)008:181: nyi ma snga dro dang po la 'aja'i gdugs dang /
NK032(khi)008:183: ka ba lta bu mang po byung /
NK032(khi)008:186: de nas mi sum cu tsam dang dmar dang phar ngos kyi mi thams cad kyis mthong nas /
NK032(khi)008:187: phyogs su phyag mang po btsal /
NK032(khi)008:188: chos thon nas ri bo'i logs la skyo sangs la byon pa dang /
NK032(khi)008:189: bla ma grongs 'gro ba min nam snyam nas /
NK032(khi)008:190: 'khor kun gyis 'ja' de mi dga' ba min nam zhus pas /
NK032(khi)008:193: bar ston shes rab grags spun gnyis kyis gdams pa
NK032(khi)008:194: 'di zhus pa'i dus su ngam shod klungs dang phug
NK032(khi)008:195: po che'i ri logs tsam 'jas khengs pa byung /
NK032(khi)008:196: gdams pa 'di la 'ongs pa yin gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:197: 'o na dga' ba lags sam zhus pas /
NK032(khi)008:198: dga' ba'i rlom pa yang byar med gang la yang rlom pa med pa gal che gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:199: 'dzing na bzhugs pa'i dus su jo sras 'dzeng gis bla ma'i spyan sngar byon pas /
NK032(khi)008:200: bla ma nub phyogs kyi mchod rten rtsa'i gad kha gcig na bzhugs nas 'dug /
NK032(khi)008:201: de nas dper gangs su phyin tsa na bla ma ni ma mthong /
NK032(khi)008:203: de nas rtsar phyin rtsa na 'od mi 'dug bla ma bzhugs nas 'dug /
NK032(khi)008:204: de ci tshugs lags zhus pas /
NK032(khi)008:205: bla ma'i zhal nas mnyam par bzhag tsa na 'ong gi 'dug /
NK032(khi)008:207: grong chog mkhan de la de 'dra cang 'ong ngam zer nas sdig bsog tu 'ong /
NK032(khi)008:208: slob dpon kun la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan lta bu mnga' yang /
NK032(khi)008:209: mnga' ba bzhin du yang mi byed /
NK032(khi)008:210: khyod de 'dra rtogs pa la dga' bar 'dug kha rog sdod gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:211: lan gcig byin rlabs mdzad pa'i cod pan kyu ba'i khab stor bas /
NK032(khi)008:212: sang nub nam phyedatsa na kha ba 'di na skya na re 'dug gsung ste /
NK032(khi)008:213: don la nyin mtshan med par yin pa 'dra /
NK032(khi)008:214: a jo dang dngos grub po la mdze byung nas ngas bzlas grogs byas pas /
NK032(khi)008:215: khos mdze ma sos pas ngas phyag na rdo rje zhal mthong ste rgod bro gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:216: zhu ru bzhugs pa'i dus su mi g.yo ba dang
NK032(khi)008:217: dzam b+ha la dang mgon po lcam dral zhal mthong
NK032(khi)008:218: gsungs / de nas dgung lo brgya dang gnyis lon
NK032(khi)008:219: pa'i dus su bla ma bsnyung bas 'khor kun grongs
NK032(khi)008:220: kyi dogs tsa na bla ma'i zhal nas /
NK032(khi)008:221: mdangs rmi lam bzang bas nga mi 'chi gsungs /
NK032(khi)008:223: nga ru'i sog ra'i steng na 'dug pa la /
NK032(khi)008:224: nyi zla gnyis shar nas byung /
NK032(khi)008:225: ru ba'i spyil po mang po'i nang na /
NK032(khi)008:228: bla ma 'dzeng khyod lo bzhi na shog zer ba rmis byung /
NK032(khi)008:229: de nas 'khor kun gyis bu slob rnams bsdus nas /
NK032(khi)008:230: dge ba gcig mdzad par zhus pas /
NK032(khi)008:231: de 'dra mi byed dge ba dang sdig pa gang che cha med /
NK032(khi)008:234: yi dam lha dang mkha' 'gro la bsnyen sgrub mang po yang byas /
NK032(khi)008:235: ci byas dge bar song bas yid smon la mi re /
NK032(khi)008:236: gang zag dbang po rab ma shi bar sangs rgya /
NK032(khi)008:238: tha ma bar dor sangs rgya ba'i gdams ngag yod de /
NK032(khi)008:239: 'dus byas kyi dge rtsa la mi re /
NK032(khi)008:240: chos nyid la blang dor dang rgyun chad med /
NK032(khi)008:241: kho da lta rang yod pa yin pa la na
NK032(khi)008:242: tsha med par shi nas 'dug zer ba gcig las
NK032(khi)008:243: mi 'ong gsungs / de nas lo gsum lon nas bcud len gcig mdzad par zhus pa las /
NK032(khi)008:245: bcud len byas na lo bcu tsam tshe bsring bar 'dug ste /
NK032(khi)008:246: dus ngan pa la tshe bsring ba la dgos pa mi 'dug gsungs nas ma gnang /
NK032(khi)008:247: dgung lo brgya dang lnga bcu bdun yin pa 'dra
NK032(khi)008:248: ste gzhung rgyas pa'i skabs su rgyu mtshan bcas gsung
NK032(khi)008:251: de nas sos dang po la sku gshegs nas /
NK032(khi)008:252: pur sbyangs pas nam mkha' 'jas khengs /
NK032(khi)008:254: ring bsrel dpag tu med pa byon /
NK032(khi)008:255: khong gi dwags po'i gzigs ye shes dbang po la gnang /
